thread.title: Tina Mirabella
thread.title_full: Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc reviewed by Tina Mirabella

author: Tina Mirabella
title: Tina Mirabella
text: My family and I recently moved to the area and needed to get 4 new tires on our 2015 Jeep Cherokee. Prior to having our car serviced, we researched on-line for the tires we wanted, and had them ordered into the West Lebanon location. Our Salesperson, Eric, was fantastic (and so was John). He was very informative and even discussed the options of other tire brands. He made me feel confident about the purchase being made and took great care of me. The service appointment went quickly and I was well organized. We're totally happy with our purchase! Thank you
